data.title: Philip José FARMER
data.meta_description: Softcover. First edition. Paperback original. Lightly rubbed, single line top of the page edges, else a very near fine copy, with no creases on the spine, and a tiny crease to one corner. A very nice copy. Beacon Books 277. Item #97577
data.text:
FARMER, Philip José

Flesh

(New York): A Galaxy Magazine Prize Science Fiction Selection for Beacon Books, (1960).

Price: $75.00

Softcover. First edition. Paperback original. Lightly rubbed, single line top of the page edges, else a very near fine copy, with no creases on the spine, and a tiny crease to one corner. A very nice copy. Beacon Books 277.

Item #97577

item image

Philip Jose Farmer

birth name: Philip Jose Farmer

born: 1/26/1918

died: 2/25/2009

View Reference Info

Biography

American science-fiction writer who won a Hugo Award for To Your Scattered Bodies Go, the first book in his Riverworld sereis.more

Collecting tips:
